ygData.subject: Re: Flight Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, this spell does not need to be researched... I have it, I bought it....  (The spell is called Levitate) Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, this spell does not need to be researched... I have it, I bought it.... (The spell is called Levitate)

Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Lee [SMTP:kenlee@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 12:27 PM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Flight Spell

From: "Ken Lee" <kenlee@...>

The Wizard Flight spell, is the same as the Shaman Levitate spell, and it
needs to be researched. However, I've heard of people referring to the
wizard spell as flight and also as levitate. I believe it's the same thing.

Zalbar
18th Wizard (sigh, died and lost a bub AGAIN last night)
Solusek Ro
